  • Vumble case study

     Feb 28, 2017

    I finished my case study for Vumble and deployed it to my personal website.

    It breaksdown my process in creating Vumble and highlights some of the front end engagements that I developed. You can checkout the case study here.

     Feb 27, 2017

    As I prepare to hunt for jobs in NYC, I decided to make a few updates to my resume. Mainly adding my tech projects to showcase my technical experience.

     Feb 26, 2017

  • Paginating my activity sheet

     Feb 25, 2017

    My activity sheet is getting long and loading 50 plus posts on one page just isn't efficient, so I spent time today figuring out how to paginate my activity sheet.

    I also worked tonight as a photographer. Here are a couple pics from my events this weekend.

  • Stash is up!

     Feb 24, 2017

    We officially deployed Stash to our main url http://stash.ag

    We've begun reaching out to early users to test the product and are collecting feedback. I'm excited to hear what people think!

  • Revamping my personal site... again

     Feb 22, 2017

    My personal site didn't excite me so I decided to make some changes.

    Brendan suggested that I try to incorporate some of my values into the experience to better express who I am. The first words that come to mind are: curiosity, discovery and exploration. I have some ideas, but we'll see what I come up with.

  • A new goal: NYC Summer 2017

     Feb 21, 2017

    I'm setting a new goal for myself. By my birthday (June 9th), I want to be living and working in NYC.

    It's a great time to expand my horizons and my mom is finally in the homestrecth of recovering from her 4 foot surgeries.

    Here are some pics from a previous trip up to the city.

  • Roadblocks in deployment

     Feb 20, 2017

    Deploying tech products is simultaneously exciting and strenuous.

    We've merged our changes together and when we deployed them to staging there were multiple unforeseen errors. It's easy to forget how much testing is involved before launching a good product and I need to spend some more time working with the guys to iron out the bugs.

    We also closed a sprint today and outlined what we're working on next. Good things are coming!

  • Sunny day and preparing to launch

     Feb 19, 2017

    It was gorgeous out today! I went down to DC and walked around with Osebo.

    Jamba Juice smoothies

    Majestic dog

    Later we met up with Diego at his spot in Dupont and finalized everything we're including in tomorrow's deployment. Everything should be good to go on both web and mobile. I'm excited!
